name: Tiny Toon Adventures: The Great Beanstalk
description:
After failing with a monkey-making scheme, Pucky Duck and Buster Bunny only have a single pouch of magic beans left. Just like in the fairytale, a huge beanstalk emerges from the beans and open up new worlds and - supposedly - greast treasures. The player takes control over Plucky while they explore eight different areas in a scavenger hunt based on nursery rhymes. Prizes include the goose that laid the golden eggs and a fabled, priceless harp. The comical quest takes our heroes through classic nursery rhyme locations based on Little Red Riding Hood, The Three Bears, Old Mother Hubbard and more.

The game consists of two parts: First are the sequences on the beanstalk where Plucky tries to reach the next treasure location. Those are platforming sections in which the end of the screen needs to be reached without dying to one of the many obstacles, for example by rolling to the side when a weight appears and threatens to bury Plucky. An optional hard difficulty adds additional hazards and traps.

When the clue locations are reached, the game becomes a point & click adventure. Based on a clue provided by Babs Bunny, Plucky needs to find the correct item to click on. Each location consists of a single screen and has a number of optional hot-spots which launch animations. When the the item was found, Plucky receives part of a key; three parts of a key open up the chance to steal a valuable prize from the mysterious giant.
developedBy: NewKidCo, Inc., TerraGlyph Interactive Studios, L.P.

shot.caption: We begin the game with Plucky and Buster arguing because they found the castle doors locked.
Babs "drops" in and tells them she can help.
She begins by giving a clip show to explain to us what brought our heroes to this predicament in the first place
Someone stole Buster's Chicken (that lays golden eggs), large vault of loot and golden harp...leaving him in the poor house.
Of course, he then sells his family cow for a bag of beans instead of money
Plucky, in anger, throws away the beans...
...which grows into a huge beanstalk.
Title screen
Main Menu - Choose between Easy or Hard settings, Access the Option screen, or view the intro movie.
Options menu - let's you control the sound, return to main menu, copy down the current password, or enter a password.
Start of the game - After Plucky & Buster climbs up the beanstalk, Babs (through the magic speakers) will tell you what you have to find first.
As you trouble between worlds, many obstacles will pop up...i.e. a giant hammer.
Jump over caps and follow Buster has he leads the way.
Duck to avoid getting hit.
Duck an roll to reach the button and at the same time avoid getting hit.
Be careful of bombs.
Found the first clue - A wolf in a traffic light.
Every time you find a clue, you will receive a piece of the key.
Using the first key to enter the castle
Woohoo! We got the Chicken that lays golden eggs!
Plucky refuses to return up the beanstalk for other items...until Buster mentions the loot.
